channel.title: Anti-Aliasing 3D World
channel.description:
The rendering of the 3D world tends to be very aliased. This is particularly visible in the throne room with the rotating camera. Could you please add some sort of aliasing, such as SSAA?
Don't know how your back-end looks like, but should be pretty straightforward to implement.
